message: Hi Bob, I propose that I receive $600000 and you receive $400000. I believe this split fairly reflects our positions in this negotiation while giving you a solid offer. Looking forward to your decision.
Alice, I propose a more balanced split. I'll take $550000 and you get $450000. This is a fairer distribution and I hope you'll accept.

Hi Bob, I appreciate our ongoing negotiation. To move things forward, I'm proposing a division where you receive $560000 and I take $440000. I believe this slight bonus for you is a fair incentive to settle now rather than prolong the discussion. I hope you'll agree and we can finalize this amicably.
